alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Macomb; Oakland; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 11:26AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lapeer, eastern Oakland, Macomb and central St. Clair Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1125 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms from Dryden to near New Baltimore to Pontaic, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marine City and Harsens Island around 1145 AM EDT. Algonac around 1150 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Anchorville, Roseville, Shelby Township, Ray Center, Utica, Washington, Lathrup Village, Auburn Hills, Lake Angelus and Pleasant Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
